
								Breadcrumbresolver					Breadcrumb						Router 	
-- create(Router, array(Breadcrumb)) --> 
										||
-- bool resolve (RouteMatch)		-->
										||
											<- findBreadcrumb
											[if != null]

												[
													while	----> getChild() 
																		||
													BreadCrumb <--------
												]

												----------------------------getMatch('routeName')--> 
																									||
												<---------------------------------------------------

											[if !match]
												------------------------------- resolveByName('name', [])
																											---> [resolveByName]

									------------------------------> setUrl(url)
